name: sleeper-ff-bot
description: A GroupMe/Slack/Discord Bot for Sleeper fantasy leagues

BOT_TYPE.description: The type of Bot. Options are groupme, slack, discord, or telegram.

BOT_ID.description: The Groupme bot_id. Required if BOT_TYPE=groupme

SLACK_WEBHOOK.description: The Slack Webhook. Required if BOT_TYPE=slack

DISCORD_WEBHOOK.description: The Discord Webhook. Required if BOT_TYPE=discord

TELEGRAM_WEBHOOK.description: The Telegram Webhook. Required if BOT_TYPE=telegram

TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN.description: The Telegram Bot Token. Required if BOT_TYPE=telegram

TELEGRAM_CHAT_ID.description: The Telegram Chat ID. Required if BOT_TYPE=telegram

CLOSE_NUM.description: How close a game score needs to be to be considered close.

NUMBER_OF_PLAYOFF_TEAMS.description: The number of playoff teams in the league.

SEASON_START_DATE.description: The start date of the season (first Thursday of the regular season) in YYYY-MM-DD format.

PRE_SEASON_START_DATE.description: The start date of the pre-season (Hall of Fame game) in YYYY-MM-DD format.

OFF_SEASON_START_DATE.description: The start date of the off-season (Draft Order Updates) in YYYY-MM-DD format.

STOP_DATE.description: The date messages should stop in YYYY-MM-DD format.

INIT_MESSAGE.description: True/False should the bot send the initialize message.
